    • Constructor Detail

      • ParticleProjectile

        public ParticleProjectile(Particle particle,
                  double size,
                  double mass,
                  double speed,
                  double distance)
        Super class for creating custom particle projectiles
        Parameters:
        particle - Particle type
        size - Size of the hitbox (normal: 0.1)
        mass - Mass of the projectile in grams
        speed - Speed of the projectile in meters/second
        distance - Max travel distance in meters

    • Method Detail

      • launch

        public final void launch(LivingEntity who)
        Launches the particle with physics affecting trajectory
        Parameters:
        who - The source entity launching the projectile

      • launch

        public final void launch(LivingEntity who,
          boolean physics)
        Launches the particle with optional physics affecting trajectory
        Parameters:
        who - The source entity launching the projectile
        physics - Set to True for the projectile to be affected by physics (gravity and drag)

      • launch

        public final void launch(LivingEntity who,
          World where,
          boolean physics)
        Launches the particle from a LivingEntity with optional physics affecting trajectory
        Parameters:
        who - The source entity launching the projectile
        where - The world the projectile is located
        physics - Set to True for the projectile to be affected by physics (gravity and drag)

      • launch

        public final void launch(LivingEntity who,
          World where,
          Vector end_offset,
          boolean physics)
        Launches the particle with offset and optional physics affecting trajectory
        Parameters:
        who - The source entity launching the projectile
        where - The world the projectile is located
        end_offset - Affects end location of particle
        physics - Set to True for the projectile to be affected by physics

      • launch

        public final void launch(LivingEntity who,
          World where,
          Vector start_offset,
          Vector end_offset,

        Launches the particle with offsets and optional physics affecting trajectory
        Parameters:

        where - The world the projectile is located
        start_offset - Affects start location of particle
        end_offset - Affects end location of particle
        physics - Set to True for the projectile to be affected by physics

      • launch

        public final void launch(LivingEntity who,
          World where,
          Location start,
          Vector start_offset,
          Vector end_offset,
          boolean physics)
        Launches the particle from start with offsets and optional physics affecting trajectory
        Parameters:
        who - The source entity launching the projectile (can be null)
        where - The world the projectile is located
        start - Location that the particle starts at
        start_offset - Affects start location of particle
        end_offset - Affects end location of particle
        physics - Set to True for the projectile to be affected by physics

      • launch

        public final void launch(LivingEntity who,
          World where,
          Vector start,
          Vector direction,
          Vector start_offset,
          Vector end_offset,
          boolean physics)
        Launches the particle from start in direction with offsets and optional physics affecting trajectory
        Parameters:
        who - The source entity launching the projectile (can be null)
        where - The world the projectile is located
        start - Location that the particle starts at
        direction - Direction of travel
        start_offset - Affects start location of particle
        end_offset - Affects end location of particle
        physics - Set to True for the projectile to be affected by physics
